author: kfogel
msg: * COMMITTERS: Convert to UTF-8 so everybody's name can be represented.
Put a 'utf-8' coding marker in local variables list for Emacs.
(Other editors may have similar magic, if so, please add.)

author: jpieper
msg: In FSFS, perform changed path folding during commit finalization.
Also ignore the temporary node-id of mutable nodes marked as deleted.
Previously, the changed path finaliation routine would attempt to
resolve the deleted node's temporary node-id into a permanent one,
which was impossible since the node was deleted.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.h
(svn_fs_fs__txn_changes_fetch): Add a new parameter so that the
copyfrom information can be read from a transactions changed path
list as well as from a revision.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(svn_fs_fs__txn_changes_fetch): Pass the copyfrom parameter through
to fetch_all_changes.
(write_change_entry): New, factorized function to write a single
change entry to an open file.
(svn_fs_fs__add_change): Utilize write_change_entry to write the
actual entry.
(write_final_changed_path_info): Read the entire changed path
information from the transaction into memory, perform folding,
then use write_change_entry to write them into the permanent
rev-file.  Do not translate the temporary node-id of deleted nodes
that were mutable in this transaction.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/tree.c
(undelete_change): Pass a NULL for the new copyfrom_cache field when
getting the current transaction's changes.

author: ghudson
msg: Use unsigned char arrays for MD5 digests in ra_svn CRAM-MD5 code.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/cram.c
(hex_decode): Accept an unsigned char *hashval.
(compute_digest): Accept an unsigned char *digest.
(svn_ra_svn_cram_server): Use unsigned char for cdigest and sdigest.

author: ghudson
msg: * Makefile.in: Fix the check-clean target to clean
tests/libsvn_fs_base instead of tests/libsvn_fs.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/redhat-7.x/subversion.spec,
packages/rpm/redhat-8+/subversion.spec,
packages/rpm/wbel-3/subversion.spec,
packages/rpm/fedora-1/subversion.spec : Fix PERL bindings install.  Also
package new locale files.
